SEARCH
Package wsp

Class Dean

java.lang.Object
wsp.User
wsp.Employee
wsp.Teacher
wsp.Dean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Dean extends Teacher implements Serializable
The Dean class represents a dean user in the system. Deans have the ability to manage requests, sign emergency requests, view news, and perform other dean-specific tasks.
See Also:

    Signs emergency requests by accepting them and removing them from the list of pending requests.

    Adds a request to the list of requests associated with the Dean.
    void
    viewMenu()
    Displays the dean's menu, allowing them to view requests, sign requests, view news, view papers, exit, and optionally view the researcher menu if they are also a researcher.

    Displays all requests in the system.
